QueryViewSpec.Name: Update Rev Schedule Start Date Post Run Check Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays RevenueSchedule.StartDate records that were updated.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Mark Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select rs.ID ,u.SPONSORID ,u.RGID ,rs.[STATUS] ,cast(rs.STARTDATE as DATE) as STARTDATE ,u.REVENUESCHEDULE_STARTDATE as PREVIOUS_STARTDATE ,u.NTD ,dbo.UFN_REVENUE_STARTDATEVALID(rs.ID, rs.STARTDATE) as STARTDATEVALID ,cast(ft.DATE as DATE) as FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rs join FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = rs.ID join dbo.USR_REVENUESCHEDULE_BEFORE_STARTDATE_UPDATE u on u.RGID = ft.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID;
